There‚Äôs no pause in paws as Dr. Brenda and Dr. Lisa treat a variety of foot injuries, including a Sheltie with broken toes. Dr. Pol examines a massive mastiff with tummy trouble and an injured rabbit. The Pol family add a pregnant Friesian mare to the herd and Dr. Nicole has her hands full with a rooster and a cat.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Tricky cases need PVS treatment during a spooky Halloween season! Dr. Pol aids a pot-bellied pig that was attacked by two dogs. A descendant of racehorse Secretariat has a problematic ear issue. A stalled laboring Lab brings a bunch of adorable puppies into the world. And, Dr. Pol helps a sweet kitten find a new home.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Pol Veterinary Services is overrun by puppies who don‚Äôt want to take their medicine. Dr. Pol treats three goats and one adorable miniature horse, while Dr. Brenda meets her match in a sassy reindeer. The vets must work overtime to help energetic pit-mix Tater after he eats something mysterious and life-threatening.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: The battle between predator and prey is not always about power and strength. Knowing what lurks in the dark can mean the difference between life and death. Extraordinary powers that penetrate darkness give some creatures the edge, and the chance to live another day.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In nature, the prevailing rule is ‚Äòeat or be eaten.‚Äô Avoiding predators and competition for space, food, and mates is a priority for every animal. But before you can attack, you need to be able to defend yourself. After eons of evolution, animals have developed powerful and surprising defensive techniques that help them avoid, overcome, or escape challengers.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetle's boiling spray to the mantis shrimp's explosive club and the draco lizard‚Äôs hidden wings, meet nature's awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isn‚Äôt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Predator V Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. A female leopard deploys stealth, strength and agility to take down prey on land, in water and from the air.

programme.title: Africa's Deadliest: Compilation
programme.desc: In Africa, vital water sources quickly transform from oases into battlegrounds. Territorial hippos fiercely defend shrinking pools, using sharp teeth and powerful heads to defeat intruders. For other animals, calm waters are lifelines, but danger always lurks nearby. Where there‚Äôs water, there is war.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly. The clip of lion vs cheetah is a nail biting moment that will shock, but in the end will shed new light on the mysterious relationship between these extraordinary big cats and their life-and-death struggle for survival.
